title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.121 - Cyanogen bromide
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.121 - Cyanogen bromide

State Regulations

Cyanogen bromide is restricted to a maximum quantity
per vehicle of 2000 pounds gross weight--provided, however, it is packed in
tightly closed glass, earthenware, or metal inside containers and not over
one-pound capacity each, securely cushioned and packed in outside wooden boxes
with a gross weight of not more than 35 pounds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.121

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
